part time.question: How do researchers and technicians of Academia Sinica apply for part-time jobs?
part time.answer:
If the researchers and technicians of Academia Sinica want to apply for part-time jobs, they must first ensure that the part-time job will not affect their main work. Then, unless there are special regulations, they need to obtain the consent of the director of the institute or research center where they are located, and then be approved by the Academia Sinica. Later, if their part-time job expires and they want to continue the part-time job, or if the part-time job is changed, they need to submit another application for review by the Academia Sinica.

Furthermore, if they want to participate in research projects funded outside Academia Sinica without using the internal work or other resources of Academia Sinica, they also need to apply for part-time jobs and get the approval of Academia Sinica in accordance with the regulations. However, if they will use the resources of Academia Sinica to participate in research outside the academy, they need to follow the key points of the work of the Academia Sinica's funded research plan.

part time.title: Part-time job control mode (3) general license category
part time.question: Who needs to agree to apply for a part-time job?
part time.answer: The part-time job application needs to be approved by the director of the research institute or research center to which it belongs, as well as the approval of the Academia Sinica.

part time.title: Part-time job control mode (3) general license category
part time.question: What should I do if I want to renew my part-time job after the term expires or if there is any change in the part-time job?
part time.answer: If you want to continue or change your part-time position, you must apply to Academia Sinica again and wait for approval.

part time.title: Part-time job control mode (3) general license category
part time.question: If the personnel of the Academia Sinica do not use their own resources to participate in other research projects, do they need to report to the Academia Sinica for approval?
part time.answer: Yes, even if they do not use their own resources to participate in other research projects, the personnel of Academia Sinica still need to report to the academy for approval.

part time.title: Part-time job control mode (3) general license category
part time.question: If the resources of Academia Sinica are used to participate in research projects funded outside the academy, what regulations should be followed?
part time.answer: If you use the resources of Academia Sinica to participate in a research project funded outside the academy, you need to follow the regulations of the Academia Sinica for accepting funding for research projects.

part time.title: Part-time job control style (4) reporting category
part time.question: If I am a researcher at Academia Sinica, can I concurrently serve in a non-profit cause or group?
part time.answer: If you are a researcher at Academia Sinica and you do not hold an administrative position, you can indeed serve as a non-profit cause or group, as long as you do not receive a part-time fee from it. However, if you are teaching and researching in a private school, you must first obtain the consent of the supervisor and the approval of the Academia Sinica.

part time.title: Part-time job control style (4) reporting category
part time.question: I am a researcher at Academia Sinica, do I need to apply for consent and approval before I concurrently serve as an editor of an academic journal or course syllabus?
part time.answer: If you are concurrently serving as an editor of an academic journal or course syllabus, if you do not concurrently hold an administrative position, are not involved in business operations, and do not receive part-time fees, you do not need to apply for consent and approval. But you still have to handle part-time job disclosure according to the regulations.

part time.title: Part-time job control style (4) reporting category
part time.question: I am a researcher who holds an administrative position. If I do not accept a part-time fee, attendance fee or review fee while holding other positions, do I still need to apply for consent and approval?
part time.answer: No, you do not need to apply for consent and approval as long as you are working part-time in connection with your administrative duties and you are not receiving part-time, attendance or review fees. But you still have to disclose your concurrent job according to the regulations.

part time.title: Part-time job control style (4) reporting category
part time.question: If I participate in social welfare activities outside of working hours, do I need to apply for consent and approval?
part time.answer: No, as long as your activities are outside working hours, hostile to social welfare, and not long-term and continuous work, you do not need to apply for consent and approval.

part time.title: Part-time job control style (4) reporting category
part time.question: In addition to these conditions, are there any special circumstances that can be exempted from applying for consent and approval, and then you can work part-time?
part time.answer: In addition to the conditions listed above, if there are other circumstances, as long as the Academia Sinica announces that it is possible, then the part-time job under these circumstances can be exempted from application for consent and approval.

part time.title: Part-time job control pattern (5) exemption from control
part time.question: If researchers or research technicians of Academia Sinica work part-time in government agencies or public schools, do they still need to apply for consent and approval?
part time.answer: If they work part-time in government agencies or public schools, they do not need to apply for consent and approval.

part time.title: Part-time job control pattern (5) exemption from control
part time.question: If I perform and get paid according to my expertise outside working hours, do I need to declare in advance?
part time.answer: If you are paid for your expertise outside of working hours, you do not need to declare it in advance. However, if you authorize your property, intellectual property, or likeness and are properly rewarded for doing so, you don't need to declare in advance.

part time.title: Part-time job control pattern (5) exemption from control
part time.question: In addition to the circumstances mentioned in the previous two items, under what circumstances can a part-time job be performed without approval?
part time.answer: In addition to the previous two situations, as long as it is the situation announced by the Academia Sinica, you can work part-time without approval.

part time.title: Part-time job control pattern (5) exemption from control
part time.question: Under what circumstances do you need to stop working part-time?
part time.answer:
If the part-time jobs of researchers or research technicians of Academia Sinica fall into the following situations, they need to stop part-time jobs:
First, they work part-time in government departments, public schools or administrative legal person task groups or temporary positions.
Second, the remuneration they obtain by using their personal talents outside of working hours, or the consideration obtained for things related to their property, intellectual property rights and portrait rights authorization.
The third is the specific situation announced by the Academia Sinica. In these cases, they are not required to apply for consent and approval, nor are they required to disclose part-time employment. However, if the part-time job is revoked, or ordered to stop part-time work, then they have to stop part-time work.

part time.title: Define standard part-time job matters
part time.question: How does Academia Sinica regulate the part-time jobs of researchers and research technicians outside Academia Sinica?
part time.answer: Academia Sinica has specially formulated a principle called the principle of part-time treatment of researchers and research technicians of Academia Sinica. Through this set of principles, they can regulate the part-time work of researchers and research technicians outside Academia Sinica.

part time.title: Define standard part-time job matters
part time.question: What are the principles for handling part-time jobs of researchers and research technicians of Academia Sinica?
part time.answer: Academia Sinica has specially formulated a set of principles to regulate the part-time jobs of researchers and research technicians outside Academia Sinica.

part time.title: Define standard part-time job matters
part time.question: What regulations do I need to abide by when working part-time outside Academia Sinica?
part time.answer: You need to abide by the part-time processing principles for researchers and research technicians stipulated by Academia Sinica.

part time.title: Define standard part-time job matters
part time.question: What kind of regulations and restrictions does Academia Sinica have on the part-time work of researchers and research technicians?
part time.answer: In order to regulate the part-time jobs of researchers and research technicians outside Academia Sinica, Academia Sinica has formulated a set of principles as the basis for their part-time jobs.

part time.title: Part-time negative conditions
part time.question: If I work in Academia Sinica, what circumstances prevent me from working part-time?
part time.answer: If you work at Academia Sinica, there are many situations that prevent you from working part-time. For example, if your part-time job conflicts with the nature of your work at Academia Sinica, it will not work. In addition, if your part-time job will have a bad impact on your main job, or may damage the image of Academia Sinica, you will also be prohibited from part-time jobs. Also, if there is a possibility of divulging official secrets, or if there are doubts about private interests, you cannot work part-time. Part-time jobs are also not allowed if there is a risk of improper use of public funds or public property, violation of academic ethics, threat to the safety and health of personnel, violation of ethics or impact on the evaluation results of academic research, and possible conflicts of interest.

part time.title: Part-time negative conditions
part time.question: If my part-time job is too contrary to the nature of my job, will we be asked to stop?
part time.answer: Yes, if there is too much conflict between your part-time job and the nature of your job, Academia Sinica may ask you to stop part-time job.

part time.title: Part-time negative conditions
part time.question: If my part-time job may damage the image of Academia Sinica, can I continue this job?
part time.answer: If your part-time job may damage the image of Academia Sinica, then you should not be able to continue this job.

part time.title: Part-time negative conditions
part time.question: Is it possible that my part-time job may lead to the leakage of official secrets, will this be prohibited?
part time.answer: Yes, if your part-time job may lead to leakage of official secrets, Academia Sinica will prohibit it.

part time.title: Part-time negative conditions
part time.question: If my part-time job has the potential to lead me to malpractice, will that be stopped?
part time.answer: If your part-time job may allow you to engage in personal fraud, Academia Sinica will not agree.

part time.title: Part-time negative conditions
part time.question: Will my part-time job cause me to improperly use Academia Sinica's public funds or property, and will I be asked to stop it?
part time.answer: Yes, if there is such a possibility in your part-time job, Academia Sinica has the right to ask you to stop part-time job.

part time.title: Part-time negative conditions
part time.question: If I violate academic ethics because of my part-time job, will this situation stop me from continuing to work part-time?
part time.answer: Yes, if you violate academic ethics because of part-time jobs, Academia Sinica will ask you to stop part-time jobs.

part time.title: Part-time negative conditions
part time.question: If my part-time job will affect the safety or health of people, will this be prohibited?
part time.answer: Yes, if your part-time job may affect the safety or health of personnel, Academia Sinica will not approve it.

part time.title: Part-time negative conditions
part time.question: If the results of the research performance evaluation are not good, will the chance of part-time employment be lost?
part time.answer: Yes, if the results of the research performance evaluation are not good, according to the regulations of Academia Sinica, the part-time job may be suspended.

part time.title: Part-time negative conditions
part time.question: .If my part-time job violates the conflict of interest, can I continue this job?
part time.answer: If your part-time job has a violation of conflict of interest, you cannot continue this job.

part time.title: Part-time hours and part-time fee
part time.question: How many hours can researchers and research technicians of Academia Sinica work part-time at most in a week?
part time.answer: Part-time hours can be up to 8 hours a week.

part time.title: Part-time hours and part-time fee
part time.question: How many start-up companies or businesses can the researchers and research technicians of Academia Sinica concurrently hold?
part time.answer: They can concurrently hold up to four start-up or business roles.

part time.title: Part-time hours and part-time fee
part time.question: Will Academia Sinica announce the situation of employees holding concurrent positions?
part time.answer: If so, the Academia Sinica will regularly announce the part-time jobs of employees who concurrently serve as directors of start-up companies, promoters of new businesses, independent directors of profit-making enterprises, and non-executive business operations.

part time.title: Part-time hours and part-time fee
part time.question: How is the salary of part-time researchers of Academia Sinica calculated?
part time.answer: The part-time salary of researchers or research technicians of Academia Sinica is usually calculated according to the payment table for part-time expenses of military, public and educational personnel. However, if they are researchers, such as deans, vice deans or part-time supervisors, their part-time salaries are not limited to the regulations on part-time fees for military, public and educational personnel.

part time.title: Part-time hours and part-time fee
part time.question: Is there a cap on part-time fees for researchers?
part time.answer: There is no upper limit on the part-time fees of researchers, including deans, vice-presidents, and part-time supervisors, and is not limited by the part-time fee payment table for military, public and educational personnel.

part time.title: On-the-job disclosure and annual disclosure
part time.question: What should I do if I already have a part-time job when I arrive at the job?
part time.answer: If you already have a part-time job when you arrive at the job, you need to fill in a "Notice of Disclosure of Part-time Job by Academia Sinica Personnel before Arrival", explaining the part-time job you have already held. Then, it must be approved by the supervisor of your research institute or research center and approved by Academia Sinica. If it is not approved, you need to stop working part-time immediately.

part time.title: On-the-job disclosure and annual disclosure
part time.question: What kind of requirements need to be completed before the end of July every year?
part time.answer: Before the end of July each year, each unit needs to sort out the "Academia Sinica Researcher and Research Technician Part-time Job Disclosure Form" filled out by its researchers and research technicians, and then send it to Academia Sinica for reference. At the same time, it is also necessary to evaluate and review the part-time jobs of the affiliated researchers and research technicians to see if they are allowed to continue part-time jobs.

part time.title: On-the-job disclosure and annual disclosure
part time.question: If I want to continue to work part-time, what assessment do I need to go through?
part time.answer: Yes, if you want to continue to work part-time, your part-time job situation will be evaluated and reviewed every year. This assessment will be carried out by your institution. The results of the evaluation will be used as the basis for agreeing to continue your part-time job. So if you want to continue to serve concurrently, you need to pass this assessment.

part time.title: On-the-job disclosure and annual disclosure
part time.question: What documents do I need to fill out if I am part-time in a start-up with a technology transfer or research contract?
part time.answer: You need to fill in the document "Academia Sinica personnel need part-time job permission in response to technology transfer and scientific research (annual disclosure)".

part time.title: On-the-job disclosure and annual disclosure
part time.question: I have a part-time business, if it is not approved, do I need to stop immediately?
part time.answer: Yes, if your part-time business has not been approved by Academia Sinica, you must stop part-time work immediately.

part time.title: Handling of part-time job violations
part time.question: What should be done if a researcher or technician of Academia Sinica violates the part-time job regulations?
part time.answer: If the researchers or technicians of Academia Sinica violate the regulations on part-time employment, they should be transferred to the group-level ethics committee of Academia Sinica, and reviewed in accordance with the settings and operation points of the ethics committees at all levels of Academia Sinica.

part time.title: Handling of part-time job violations
part time.question: To which committee will a person who violates the part-time employment policy be referred to for consideration?
part time.answer: Those who violate the part-time job regulations will be transferred to the group-level ethics committee of Academia Sinica for review.

part time.title: Handling of part-time job violations
part time.question: What procedures will be followed to consider these cases of violation of the part-time job regulations?
part time.answer: These cases will be sent to the group-level ethics committee of the Academia Sinica, and then reviewed according to the settings and operation points of the ethics committees at all levels of the Academia Sinica.

researchers and research technicians.title: Salary
researchers and research technicians.question: How is our salary structure calculated?
researchers and research technicians.answer: Our salary is composed of two parts, one is monthly salary and the other is bonus. The monthly salary includes the basic annual merit salary and professional bonus. The deductions include public insurance, pension funds, health insurance, and rent allowances that are only deducted for those who live in public housing. As for the bonus part, it will be awarded based on academic research and year-end work performance. In particular, specially-appointed researchers have additional research grants, and approved research technicians also have technical grants. If you are in a supervisory position, additional supervisory positions will be added according to your supervisory title.

researchers and research technicians.title: Salary
researchers and research technicians.question: Is the rent subsidy only available to employees living in public housing?
researchers and research technicians.answer: Yes, the rent allowance is only available to employees living in public housing.

researchers and research technicians.title: Salary
researchers and research technicians.question: How are academic research bonuses and year-end work bonuses distributed?
researchers and research technicians.answer: Academic research bonuses and year-end job bonuses are part of the annual salary of researchers and research technicians. In other words, these amounts will be included in the annual salary distribution. As for Distinguished Research Fellows and Research Technicians, if they perform their work well, they may also receive additional research grants. If they still hold a supervisory position, their salary will also be included in the supervisory position bonus.

researchers and research technicians.title: Salary
researchers and research technicians.question: What other types of grants can Distinguished Researchers and Research Technicians receive?
researchers and research technicians.answer: Distinguished researchers can receive additional research grants, and research technicians can also receive research grants if they pass the review.

researchers and research technicians.title: Salary
researchers and research technicians.question: Is there any special salary treatment for the person who is also in charge?
researchers and research technicians.answer: In addition to the basic salary, those who hold supervisory positions can also receive bonuses according to their supervisory titles.

researchers and research technicians.title: Insurance
researchers and research technicians.question: What items does insurance service include?
researchers and research technicians.answer: Insurance services mainly include public and educational personnel insurance and national health insurance. The payment items of civil and educational personnel insurance include disability benefits, pension benefits, death benefits, family funeral benefits, maternity benefits (only open to women), and childcare benefits without pay, etc. The national health insurance includes the provision of comprehensive medical services, such as daily medical visits and emergency services.

researchers and research technicians.title: Insurance
researchers and research technicians.question: What is the difference between public education personnel insurance and national health insurance?
researchers and research technicians.answer: The main difference between civil and educational personnel insurance and national health insurance lies in their respective protection contents. Insurance for public and educational personnel includes disability, pension, and death benefits, as well as funeral allowances for family members, maternity benefits, and childcare benefits without pay. These protections cover a wide range of aspects. The national health insurance provides some medical services, including daily medical treatment and emergency treatment.

researchers and research technicians.title: Insurance
researchers and research technicians.question: After resignation, how are these two types of insurance handled?
researchers and research technicians.answer: After you leave your job, the Personnel Office of Academia Sinica will handle the withdrawal of insurance for you in accordance with the Civil and Educational Personnel Insurance Law and the National Health Insurance Law. That is to say, you will be released from the protection of civil and educational personnel insurance and national health insurance.

researchers and research technicians.title: Insurance
researchers and research technicians.question: What medical services does National Health Insurance provide?
researchers and research technicians.answer: The medical services provided by the national health insurance include comprehensive medical services such as daily medical treatment and emergency treatment.

researchers and research technicians.title: Insurance
researchers and research technicians.question: What are the payment items that public and educational personnel insurance can apply for?
researchers and research technicians.answer: The payment items that can be applied for by public and educational personnel insurance include disability benefits, old-age benefits, death benefits, funeral benefits for family members, maternity benefits (only for women), and childcare benefits without pay.
